title: Deep Learning Competency Enhancement: Language-Based Federated Learning for Tactile Perception Differentiation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and fundamental proficiency in digital device usage
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: After five days of associative learning, learners can differentiate tactile stimulus patterns with 80% accuracy.
Learners can enhance perceptual sensitivity by over 30% by combining language labels with tactile stimuli.
Through project presentations, learners can explain the scientific principles of associative learning according to peer evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
